name: The Cursed Guardians Of The Torch: Game Jam Edition
name_original: The Cursed Guardians Of The Torch: Game Jam Edition
description:
Made for the weekly game jam by The Starglide Alliance (consisting of Lizzemea, Moses25, Tigercat1979)

Play as two players tossing a torch between each other. Earn points by tossing and picking it up

You lose if the aliens pick it up

Warning, has a few bugs, if you wish to close the game, hit the windows key and close the window
